participant_1.background:
My mother is a librarian.
I would like to be a journalist one day.
I love to read fantasy novels and poetry.
I often help her sort books in the library.

participant_2.background:
I am a huge buffalo bills fan , and our family has season tickets.
I am currently studying at union college and want to be an english teacher.
I grew up in syracuse , ny with my parents and brother.
I would also like to study abroad in spain.
That way , after graduating , i can teach english there for a year or two.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of the Buffalo Bills too!
Awesome! I'm glad to meet someone else who shares my passion for football.
What's your favorite thing about the Bills?
I love their team spirit and their dedication to winning.
Me too! They're always so exciting to watch.
I know, right? I can't wait to see how they do this season.
Me neither! I think they have a great chance of making the playoffs.
I hope so! That would be so exciting.
It would be amazing! I'm sure they'll give it their all.
I know they will. They're a great team.
So, what's your dream job?
I want to be an English teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a journalist, so I love reading and writing.
I love reading and writing too! That's why I want to be an English teacher.
That's great! I think you'd be a great teacher.
Thanks! I hope so!
So, what are you going to do after college?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about studying abroad in Spain for a year or two.
That would be awesome! I've always wanted to visit Spain.
Me too! I think it would be a great experience.
I'm sure it would be! I think you should definitely go for it.
I will! I'm excited to see what the future holds.
